author: Filmento
description:
Disney's 2025 remake of Snow White is one of the worst movies of the decade and obviously flopped badly. But it did manage to do one amazing thing: unite all different people to hate it and wish for its failure. That's pretty astonishing in today's divided world. So let's dive into the main criticisms hurled at the movie on Twitter and Reddit to see what it does wrong. How the filmmakers made a movie that everyone dislikes. Rachel Ziegler and Gal Gadot do their best to make the movie terrible, sure, but there's more beyond that.

Book, Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BW1TN97D?ref_=pe_3052080_276849420

Disney's Snow White (2025)
From the producer and executive producer of “Wicked,” comes “Disney’s Snow White,” a live-action musical reimagini
title: Snow White – How to Make a Movie That Everyone Hates | Anatomy of a Failure
